Posts.Content: Mar 22, 2010 10:35PM jazzie1 wrote: Hi Jenweg, It is not all doom & gloom, I had a mastectomy of my left breast two weeks ago and am recovering very well, (showering myself within 13 hours of operation) the cancer had not spread to my lymph nodes.Â  I saw an oncologist yesterday who advised that it was estrogen receptive positive, so I will be taking Tamoxifin for the next 5 years, but he also advised it was not of great benefit for me to have chemo (only 2% benefit). I was feeling exactly the same but now feel very positive about the future. I am 49 and planning a big 50th for three weeks time and going back to work tomorrow. Will plan a reconstruction in the future. All the very best to you.....jazzie
Posts.Title: Newly Diagnosed & Overwhelmed VRamos Denise2287
